name: CreateResumeAttachment
description:
Create a new resume attachment for a prospect.

This tool creates a resume attachment for a specified prospect. It should be called when you need to add a resume file to a prospect's profile in the recruiting system. Requires the fileName and attachmentContent fields.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID for the prospect resource to attach the resume.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: resume_attachment_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the required fields: `fileName` and `attachmentContent` for the resume attachment.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
